item.title: Kubernetes Cross Cluster Communication
item.description: Kubernetes Cross Cluster Communication Depending on your requirements and needs, you might not need cross cluster communication at the pod level. In most cases, stateless components are running within your cluster and talking to some stateful components like databases which are running outside of the cluster. This is a common approach right now because it is still very difficult to run stateful components on a kubernetes cluster even if some solutions exist like statefulsets which add ordering and stable dns for your pods.
